items.title: My case for veganism
items.content_text: I make a case for veganism and why you probably already agree with all the reasons you should be vegan. And how I wish people would reframe the topic, to make it less contentious, emotional and, frankly, annoying.

items.title: A day in the life of an Omnivore
items.content_text: I take a toung-in-cheek look at how I imagine the life of a meat eater to look. At least based on my own experience.

items.title: I've been diagnosed with ADHD
items.content_text: I’ve been diagnosed with ADHD. I ramble incoherently for a while and I might do some less rambling posts about it in the future.
